page.title: 16HEALTH, MENZIESHILL,DUNDEE.
page.content: {The Day Hospital { {The Day Hosptal}was officially opened on the{14th FEB,83.}The Day Hospital is connected with Liff Hospital. The Hospital caters for ladies from{55-100 who are{psychiatric.}The hospital {opens at 9.25am and closes at 4.15pm. {They}get to The Hospital by ambulance. The boundary is Forest Park Road.At the Day Hospital they get breakfast, dinner and a snack in the afternoon. They also get baths,hair washes and medicines.In the summer some pastients go on bus trips around the region.{ { { { {
